name: Date with submas DEMO
description:
Your task is to successfully spend time with Emmet on a date and fill the entire scale to the maximum. The gameplay is to move around the map to different locations to complete quests in a free order.

The game is under development. And this is a demo version that shows the gameplay of the dialogues. In the future there will be 4 mini-games, the ability to give gifts, equipment and a large map of attractions. The game supports Russian and English languages.

Warning:

- There may be semantic errors in the text.
- This is not a commercial project, free to download.
- The original universe of the game belongs to "The Pokemon Company".

If you want to support us, you can go to our Boosty .
